433Mhz Conrad RSL366T protocol
Encoding format in Hex: xxyyzz

xx ... Group A-D
		A = 2A
		B = 8A
		C = A2
		D = A8
		
yy ... Channel 1-4
		1 = 2A
		2 = 8A
		3 = A2
		4 = A8
		
zz ... On/Off
		on = AA
		off = A8
		

Example
				Binary			   Dec	   Hex

A1off  0001010100010101010101000 2763432  2A2AA8
A1on   0001010100010101010101010 2763434  2A2AAA

B1off  0100010100010101010101000 9054888  8A2AA8
B1on   0100010100010101010101010 9054890  8A2AAA

B2off  0100010101000101010101000 9079464  8A8AA8
B2on   0100010101000101010101010 9079466  8A8AAA

B3off  0100010101010001010101000 9085608  8AA2A8 
B3on   0100010101010001010101010 9085610  8AA2AA 

C4off  0101000101010100010101000 1066008  A2A8A8 
C4on   0101000101010100010101010 1066010  A2A8AA 

D3off  0101010001010001010101000 11051688 A8A2A8 
D3on   0101010001010001010101010 11051690 A8A2AA
